Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • snake.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable

    public class Snake
extends javafx.application.Application
implements Loggable
    Runner class that initiates all high level tasks pertaining to the game
